content: example of this pattern measures 7 inches height by 3 inches width by 3 inches depth using the following gauge 16 single_crochet x 15 row = 4 inches all supplies remain the same except for the following replacements * super bulky 6 weight yarn in 3 colors * yarn a pink example uses premier parfait chunky bubblegum * yarn b blue example uses premier parfait chunky seaside * yarn c beige example uses premier parfait chunky almond butter * optional medium 4 weight yarn in 8 colors for sprinkles * white example uses premier parfait chunky white * red example uses premier parfait chunky poppy * orange example uses premier parfait chunky carrot * yellow example uses premier parfait chunky sunshine * light green example uses premier parfait chunky key lime * dark green example uses limited edition premier parfait chunky seaweed salad recommended replacement is premier parfait chunky kelly green * blue example uses premier parfait chunky rock candy * purple example uses limited edition premier parfait chunky acai recommended replacement is premier parfait chunky iris * 14mm black safety eyes x2 * pink yarn example uses premier parfait chunky pink lemonade * black embroidery floss doubled **terminology ** this free crochet ice cream cone amigurumi pattern uses english us terminology * st sts = stitch stitches * chain = chain stitch * slip_stitch = slip_stitch * single_crochet = single_crochet * decrease = single_crochet 2 together over the span of 2 stitches also known as a decrease * skip = skip please note that this pattern is written so that each crochet stitch abbreviation is attached to a number such as 1sc 2sc etc this number denotes how many of that stitch is to be worked into the same stitch in other words 1sc = one single_crochet whereas 2sc = two single_crochet worked into one stitch also known as an increase **follow us for more crochet content and amigurumi adventures ** https //virkadia com/ | blog https //virkadia etsy com | etsy https //www instagram com/virkadia | instagram https //www pinterest com/virkadia | pinterest https //www facebook com/virkadia | facebook https //www tiktok com/@virkadia | tiktok **thank you for all of your support **
